data.title: Biography of Alfonso "Fat" II King Portugal 1185
data.meta_description: Biography of Alfonso "Fat" II King Portugal 1185-1223 including his birth, marriages, death and life events, life events of his siblings, and his ancestry to five generations, royal ancestors and royal descendants.
data.text:
On 23 Apr 1185 Alfonso "Fat" II King Portugal was born to Sancho "Populator" I King Portugal 1154-1211 (age 30) and Dulce Barcelona Queen Consort Portugal at Coimbra.

On 06 Dec 1185 [his grandfather] Afonso "Conqueror Founder Great" I King Portugal 1109-1185 (age 76) died. On 06 Dec 1185 His son [his father] Sancho "Populator" I King Portugal 1154-1211 (age 31) succeeded I King Portugal and reigned for twenty six years.

In 1206 Alfonso "Fat" II King Portugal (age 20) and Urraca Ivrea Queen Consort Portugal (age 18) were married. They were second cousin once removed. She a granddaughter of King Henry "Curtmantle" II of England 1133-1189. She the daughter of Alfonso VIII King Castile 1155-1214 (age 50) and Eleanor Plantagenet Queen Consort Castile (age 44). He the son of Sancho "Populator" I King Portugal 1154-1211 (age 51) and Dulce Barcelona Queen Consort Portugal.

On 08 Sep 1209 [his son] Sancho "Pious" II King Portugal 1209-1248 was born to Alfonso "Fat" II King Portugal (age 24) and [his wife] Urraca Ivrea Queen Consort Portugal (age 22).

On 05 May 1210 [his son] Alfonso III King Portugal was born to Alfonso "Fat" II King Portugal (age 25) and [his wife] Urraca Ivrea Queen Consort Portugal (age 22).

Around 1211 [his daughter] Eleanor of Portugal Queen Consort Denmark was born to Alfonso "Fat" II King Portugal (age 25) and [his wife] Urraca Ivrea Queen Consort Portugal (age 23).

In 1211 [his daughter] Leonor Burgundy was born to Alfonso "Fat" II King Portugal (age 25) and [his wife] Urraca Ivrea Queen Consort Portugal (age 23).

On 26 Mar 1211 [his father] Sancho "Populator" I King Portugal 1154-1211 (age 56) died. On 26 Mar 1211 His son Alfonso "Fat" II King Portugal (age 25) succeeded II King Portugal. [his wife] Urraca Ivrea Queen Consort Portugal (age 23) by marriage Queen Consort Portugal.

In 1218 [his son] Fernando Burgundy was born to Alfonso "Fat" II King Portugal (age 32) and [his wife] Urraca Ivrea Queen Consort Portugal (age 30).

On 03 Nov 1220 [his wife] Urraca Ivrea Queen Consort Portugal (age 33) died.

On 25 Mar 1223 Alfonso "Fat" II King Portugal (age 37) died at Coimbra. His son [his son] Sancho "Pious" II King Portugal 1209-1248 (age 13) succeeded II King Portugal.

[his father] Sancho "Populator" I King Portugal 1154-1211 and [his mother] Dulce Barcelona Queen Consort Portugal were married. She by marriage Queen Consort Portugal. She the daughter of Raymond Berenguer Barcelona V Count Barcelona 1114-1162. He the son of Afonso "Conqueror Founder Great" I King Portugal 1109-1185 and Malfada Savoy Queen Consort Portugal.

James I King Aragon and Eleanor Ivrea Queen Consort Aragon were married. They were half second cousins. She a granddaughter of King Henry "Curtmantle" II of England 1133-1189. She by marriage Queen Consort Aragon. She the daughter of Alfonso VIII King Castile 1155-1214 and Eleanor Plantagenet Queen Consort Castile. He the son of Peter II King Aragon 1178-1213 and Marie Montpellier Queen Consort Aragon.
